root.title: k mart km compar store februari sale
root.body: k mart corp sai februari sale rise 13.1 pct year ago compar store sale four week period end februari 25 rise 8.2 pct k mart sai consolid sale period 1,459,193,000 dlr compar 1,289,635,000 dlr last year sai year ago figur exclud sale discontinu oper design depot furr cafeteria bishop buffet k mart cite favor consum respons merchandis program sai specialti retail excel februari sale
